About Me

My Profile...

BIO

A graduate of financial Management with over 5 years combined working experience. Worked in the Agric sector immediatley after graduation from the Federal University of Technonogy Owerri Imo state, for two Years after which a mandatory one year national service. Immediately after service got a placement at a banking insitution in Lagos Nigeria where i worked for two years as a retail operations personnel. Currently i am an independent web developer and Tech specialist exploring the unlimited oppurtunities in the tech industry.
